text: Pentwyn (or Pen-twyn) may refer to the following places in Wales: *Pentwyn, Cardiff, a district of the city of Cardiff **Pentwyn (electoral ward) *Pentwyn, Rockfield, Monmouthshire *Pentwyn, Torfaen *Pen-twyn, Monmouthshire, a village in Monmouthshire *Pentwyn, Caerphilly, a village in the Darran Valley
title: Pentwyn
